tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN On) (NP (DT a) (NN raft))) (, ,) (VP (VBP imagine) (NP (VBG floating)) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT a) (JJ gentle) (NN river))) (, ,) (S (VP (VBG watching) (S (NP (NN scenery)) (VP (VB go) (PP (IN by))))))) (. .)))

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (VP (ADVP (RB Just)) (VB relax) (, ,) (VB let) (NP (DT the) (JJ current)))) (VP (VBP carry) (NP (PRP you))) (. .)))
